metadata.Title: CVE-2020-11029 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.Description: In affected versions of WordPress, a vulnerability in the stats() method ofclass-wp-object-cache.php can be exploited to execute cross-site scripting(XSS) attacks. This has been patched in version 5.4.1, along with all thepreviously affected versions via a minor release (5.3.3, 5.2.6, 5.1.5,5.0.9, 4.9.14, 4.8.13, 4.7.17, 4.6.18, 4.5.21, 4.4.22, 4.3.23, 4.2.27,4.1.30, 4.0.30, 3.9.31, 3.8.33, 3.7.33).

criterions.comment: wordpress package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
